intro: Psychotria rubriflora, commonly known as the red-flowered Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of Central and South America, where it thrives in humid, shaded environments. The plant is characterized by its striking red flowers, which are typically clustered in dense inflorescences. Its leaves are usually elliptical and have a glossy appearance, while the stems are often woody and branched. Psychotria rubriflora is also known for its potential medicinal properties, though further research is needed to confirm its therapeutic uses.
